contact.faqSubtitle: Find answers to common questions about BitWisdom AI Network
contact.cantFindAnswer: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Please get in touch with our team.
contact.infoSubtitle: Connect with us through any of these channels

faq.q1: How do consumers pay merchants with crypto and how private and secure are the transactions?
faq.a1: Consumers pay by scanning a wallet QR code; the transaction is recorded on the blockchain. Privacy depends on the blockchain used—Bitcoin and Lightning offer pseudonymity, not full anonymity.
faq.q2: What is and why run a crypto node, how difficult is it to run, including updating, what is the incentive and what are the costs involved?
faq.a2: A crypto node validates and relays transactions, supporting network integrity. It's not difficult with automated software; costs involve electricity, uptime, and hardware, with rewards or fees as incentives.
faq.q3: What is a mobile phone crypto node and a laptop crypto node and what supported crypto node options exist?
faq.a3: A mobile or laptop node is a lightweight version that connects to the network but doesn't store full blockchain data. BW supports full, pruned, and lightweight nodes depending on device capacity.
faq.q4: How much profit can be made running a crypto node in the BW Network and what's the commitment policy?
faq.a4: Profit depends on node uptime, transaction volume, and network usage. BW has no fixed return or lock-in period; earnings vary with network activity and fees collected.
faq.q5: Is BW competitive to traditional crypto payment gateway services and why would merchants prefer our system?
faq.a5: BW removes intermediaries and settles directly on-chain or via Lightning. Merchants avoid high gateway fees and delays but assume responsibility for managing their own wallets and conversions.
faq.q6: What are the benefits and how quick is the settlement time for a merchant/customer transaction on the Lightning network?
faq.a6: Lightning Network transactions settle within seconds. It enables instant, low-fee micropayments with finality once confirmed.
faq.q7: If traditional merchant transaction processing settlement takes 30+ days, what is the final settlement time and fairness level for all merchants on BW's system?
faq.a7: Settlement on BW is immediate once the blockchain confirms payment. All merchants receive funds directly without intermediaries, so fairness depends on network rules, not a central authority.
faq.q8: What cryptocurrencies does BW support now and what will be supported in the near future?
faq.a8: BW currently supports Bitcoin and Lightning-based payments. Future integrations will depend on node compatibility, network stability, and regulatory compliance.
faq.q9: Why does this system only support final transaction settlement to the merchant's wallet versus to currency?
faq.a9: Because BW operates as a decentralized payment protocol, not a fiat exchange. It transfers crypto directly to the merchant's wallet, avoiding custodial and regulatory obligations.
faq.q10: How many merchant stores can be set up on one node and how many crypto nodes can a business run?
faq.a10: Multiple stores can operate under one node, limited by hardware and bandwidth. Businesses can run multiple nodes if they want to distribute load or operate in different locations.
faq.q11: Does BW perform KYC on Qualifying BW Customers and who's responsible for KYC with onboarded merchants?
faq.a11: BW performs KYC where legally required, primarily for network-level participants. Merchants remain responsible for customer KYC or AML compliance within their jurisdictions.
faq.q12: What accounting/metrics are provided and does BW's system have support for merchant's proprietary POS terminal integration?
faq.a12: BW provides transaction logs, balance summaries, and node performance metrics. POS integration is supported through APIs and plugin modules, depending on merchant system compatibility.
faq.q13: What are the advantages of running on-premises, a powerful workstation/server for the decentralized AI Module and what happens if the crypto nodes cannot reach it?
faq.a13: Running on-premises provides faster processing, full data control, and independence from cloud reliance. If unreachable, nodes continue operating with limited functionality until reconnected.
faq.q14: Why did BW include AI and automation in its 12 patent-pending technologies and business model?
faq.a14: AI and automation handle dynamic network optimization, predictive analytics, and fraud detection. They reduce manual management and improve system efficiency.
faq.q15: Why would someone 'Help Fund Developing Country Businesses' and who does this really help?
faq.a15: It channels crypto liquidity into real businesses that lack traditional financing. The funding supports local economic growth while giving contributors measurable social and financial impact.
